text: Psychopathic Records is a record label based in Royal Oak, Michigan. It was founded in 1991 by Alex Abbiss and Horrorcore band Insane Clown Posse. The company is currently distributed by Fontana Distribution. The Psychopathic Records mascot is Hatchetman. ==Psychopathic's current signed artists== *Insane Clown Posse *Twiztid *Blaze Ya Dead Homie *Anybody Killa *Boondox *Dark Lotus *Mike E. Clark == Other websites == Psychopathic Records official website Category:American record labels
title: Psychopathic Records
